title.heading: GOD LOVES YOU AND CREATED YOU TO KNOW HIM PERSONALLY.

page.ptext1: God showed how much he loved us by sending his one and only Son into the world so that we might have eternal life through him. 1 John 4:9
page.pbutton2: God Wants You to Know Him
page.ptext2: And this is the way to have eternal life - to know you, the only true God, and Jesus Christ, the one you sent to earth. John 17:3
page.question: Why do you think most people don't know God personally?
